product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit
long_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit makes your Thule 594XT Sidearm Universal Upright Bike Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
short_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit makes your Thule 594XT Sidearm Universal Upright Bike Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
